<<< //The entire building was made of crystal. The surface of the floors was rough, providing traction and a bit more opacity, but floors, ceilings, and walls were all solid glass. The furnishings were standard wood and brass, and would have been at home in any [[Brelish|Breland]] farmhold. Somehow, the presence of such mundane furnishings only enhanced the bizarre nature of the architecture. The doors were rough wood, and they almost seemed to be floating amidst the firelit crystal.// <<<
â€”a visitor's account of the Glass House
The Glass House is a restaurant and inn located in the [[Hareth's Folly]] district of [[Sharn]]. Its central theme is invisibility; the walls are made from [[Riedra]]n [[crysteel]], the staff wear translucent [[glamerweave]] garments, and the kitchen serves unusual dishes, such as [[Aundair]]ian [[ghostfish]].
title: Glass House
